channel.title: Help
channel.description: i made a server but how do u save editin u made cos i made weildin dragon lvl 70 and it can be weilded a lvl 60 plz help

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @System79 System79
item.description:
@System79 wrote:

But again, it might not solve the problem , and proves you are wrong, so i think you should mention that ur not sure, oh and compile can screw his server up if he did alot of things wrong, makes a billion errors as u mention, and then delete’s his server files ;P, but enough of this, i dont want to get banned for counterspamming at you

Read full topic

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @haruki haruki
item.description:
@haruki wrote:

well no offence again but i dont think compiling is going to screw his server up

Read full topic

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @System79 System79
item.description:
@System79 wrote:

If he doesnt show his error, you shouldnt reply with stuff if you dont know what the error is eh,
It might mess someone’s source up if your wrong, and it will take some of your rep, atleast if you build a good reputation, and someone goes wrong, your reputation might go down with a little 10%,Thats what the risk of this is.

Read full topic

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @haruki haruki
item.description:
@haruki wrote:

well no offence to either of you but he should say what his specific error is to prevent further accusations

Read full topic

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @System79 System79
item.description:
@System79 wrote:

Did he say he didnt compile?
First hear out what the problem is before posting a reaction.
It could be compile, yes.
But it can also be a fault in the coding, there is ALOT more then just 1 line defining that you need 60 def for dragon,
What i’d do is search for something like this: if(playerLevel <skill number>
It should bring up all stuff that you need a certain defence lvl for.

Read full topic

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @haruki haruki
item.description:
@haruki wrote:

its called, compile, dont use run server use compile to SAVE newly added changes such as this. be carefull though u might get abillion errors

Read full topic
